name: matrix-rageshake-crisp
description: This script searches for conversations on the Crisp API with the state 'pending' and metadata 'email' set to a specific value.

CRISP_WEBSITE_ID.description: The ID of the Crisp website to search for conversations

RAGESHAKE_EMAIL.description: The email address to search for in the conversations' metadata.

DRY_RUN.description: Set to `True` if you don't want any change to append.
